$interpreted: Theodore: Now there's an idea... How is it that you northerners all think alike?
Valdrir: Haven't you come to gather soldiers? But the north hasn't any more left...
Valdrir: ...What is it you want, then?
Theodore: ...I'm afraid I'm asking for too much. But first...
Theodore: I hope our talks won't be disturbed by impudent hangers-on with no manners. I can be rather picky, Clan Mother, I hope you understand.
Cautious Clan Villager: In your dreams! Don't trust anything he says, Clan Mother.
Theodore: You see. There's no reasoning with such savages.
Theodore: Seeds?
Valdrir: An ability bestowed upon me by the goddess. If I suspect foul play of any kind, I'll curb your speech and movement in a flash, understand?
Theodore: ...That's an elegant solution, at least. Then let us begin.
Valdrir: ...You don't seem surprised in the least.
Theodore: There's nothing to it. You're sacrificial twins of the runes. Where Rune absorbs, I guess you discharge.
Theodore: I've seen something similar before, thanks to a certain somebody's temper.
Valdrir: (Somebody... Could he mean... Eidatyr?)
Valdrir: Go now, treat your injuries. I'll call if I need you.
Valdrir: Now will you state your conditions?
Valdrir: You've come to us from far, far away. I'm sure you weren't intending to abduct me, but the north has nothing else of value to offer you.
Theodore: If this land is really so barren, why don't you leave?
Valdrir: ...An outsider like you wouldn't understand.
Theodore: I wouldn't be so sure. I heard a lot of things while I was in Westport.
Valdrir: Those pirates over there in Westport... are all exiles from our clan. They've been stripped of their runes by the Grand Sorcerer, and the goddess has revoked them of their blessings, too.
Theodore: Then why don't you wash your hands of them?
Valdrir: Because Eidatyr—
Valdrir: ......
Valdrir: ...The Saga clan are waiting here for the goddess to return.
Theodore: The goddess of your legends, the one who rides a great dragon?
Valdrir: Tradition has it that the goddess led our ancestors in their resistance to the evil Vendacti and the people of the Sun...
Theodore: Hmph, sure. I've achieved an infamy of my own already. Nothing you say will shock me. Continue.
Valdrir: After the Holy War, the goddess used all her strength to raise a patch of tundra to the sky.
Valdrir: She used the aurora to guide the spirits of the deceased into the boundless, black night, so that they might gain eternal rest.
Theodore: So, your ancestors were those who were behind?
Valdrir: Just for the moment. Once the twins have made their offering and unsealed the Dragonheart Volcano, the flames shall show the way.
Valdrir: The goddess will ride the dragon once more and return to the northern lands. The path of the aurora will lead her people back to paradise.
Theodore: ...And you're willing to sacrifice yourself for them?
Valdrir: —For my clan, and for the north, I am. May the aurora light the way.
Theodore: (...It's them again, no doubt about it... But why are they spreading their lies and false beliefs in every land?)
Valdrir: Like I said, an outsider could never understand.
Theodore: You're mistaken. I'm absolutely certain that I've come to the right place.
Valdrir: Huh...
Theodore: The conditions have been met. What I want—is for you to leave this guarded fortress of a home village.
Valdrir: You've come for... me?!
Theodore: Don't set yourself against it just yet.
Valdrir: Wah...
Theodore: (She wants to seal up my mouth to stop me from giving orders to Rune. Such simple-minded northerners...)
Valdrir: Rune?! But why, Theodore didn't give a single command!
Rune: Must restrain. Valdrir.
Valdrir: You haven't been given any potions at all, this is all just an act! You liar! You're a despicable liar, like the rest of the southerners!
Rune: Rune, not liar.
Rune: Rune. Lie, protecting...
Theodore: Don't waste your energy explaining yourself to her, Rune.
Theodore: Like I said, this is for your sister's own protection. As long as you understand that, that's enough.
Rune: I...
Theodore: Don't think about it too much. It's just a means to an end. You've done well, and we've captured her alive.
Rune: ...You, follow agreement. Me, obey you.
Theodore: Now kill the other two, and then we can go.
Rune: Why?
Theodore: We'll have soldiers pursuing us if we leave them behind.
Theodore: We don't want any trouble or chaos. We can't risk anything happening to harm our sacrificial hostage here.
Rune: Soldiers, I stop. Kill people, no need.
Theodore: How many can you stop? One? Ten? The whole clan?
Theodore: Don't be foolish. You'll have to harden your heart if you want to protect Valdrir.
Rune: Protect...
Valdrir: Wait! I'll go with you. Just call them off so nobody has to get hurt!
Theodore: Naturally that would make things easier. But I warn you, if you're thinking of cheating me...
Valdrir: I swear, in the name of the goddess of the aurora! Please!
Theodore: Let her go, Rune.
Cautious Clan Villager: Have you reached an agreement, Clan Mother?
Valdrir: ...Yes, more or less. I must go now to meet with their allies. You can go back to the village.
Cautious Clan Villager: This is an outrage!
Valdrir: Go! Or would you sabotage our agreement, and have me punish you instead?
Cautious Clan Villager: ...Well, when you put it that way... May the aurora light your way.
Valdrir: (...I've betrayed the clan and deceived the Grand Sorcerer... It's all my fault, now I'll be punished by the goddess...)
Valdrir: (What should I do... I've sullied the tribe...)
Valdrir: ......
Theodore: I thought northerners were all like that Eidatyr, gambling everything away, or dragging everyone around them down in their recklessness.
Theodore: —But you surprise me, Clan Mother.
Valdrir: ......
Valdrir: ......
Valdrir: I... I'm not as brave as she is. I'm scum. She's the one who ought to be leading our people.
Theodore: ......
Rune: ...You... Eidatyr...
Valdrir: ......
Theodore: ...Save your reminiscences for another time. We have to be going.

Model.Text: Now there's an idea... How is it that you northerners all think alike?

...What is it you want, then?
...I'm afraid I'm asking for too much. But first...

You see. There's no reasoning with such savages.

An ability bestowed upon me by the goddess. If I suspect foul play of any kind, I'll curb your speech and movement in a flash, understand?

...You don't seem surprised in the least.

Huh...

Don't set yourself against it just yet.
Wah...
(She wants to seal up my mouth to stop me from giving orders to Rune. Such simple-minded northerners...)

Don't think about it too much. It's just a means to an end. You've done well, and we've captured her alive.
...You, follow agreement. Me, obey you.
Now kill the other two, and then we can go.

We'll have soldiers pursuing us if we leave them behind.
We don't want any trouble or chaos. We can't risk anything happening to harm our sacrificial hostage here.

Wait! I'll go with you. Just call them off so nobody has to get hurt!
Naturally that would make things easier. But I warn you, if you're thinking of cheating me...
I swear, in the name of the goddess of the aurora! Please!
Let her go, Rune.

...Yes, more or less. I must go now to meet with their allies. You can go back to the village.

I thought northerners were all like that Eidatyr, gambling everything away, or dragging everyone around them down in their recklessness.

I... I'm not as brave as she is. I'm scum. She's the one who ought to be leading our people.
...You... Eidatyr...
...Save your reminiscences for another time. We have to be going.

It's just a means to an end. You've done well, and we've captured her alive.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3680","IconName":"h3680s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...You, follow agreement. Me, obey you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now kill the other two, and then we can go.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3680","IconName":"h3680s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Why?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_31_001","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We'll have soldiers pursuing us if we leave them behind.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_31_002","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We don't want any trouble or chaos. We can't risk anything happening to harm our sacrificial hostage here.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_31_003","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3680","IconName":"h3680s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Soldiers, I stop. Kill people, no need.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How many can you stop? One? Ten? The whole clan?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't be foolish. You'll have to harden your heart if you want to protect Valdrir.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_32_002","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3680","IconName":"h3680s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Protect...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wait! I'll go with you. Just call them off so nobody has to get hurt!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Naturally that would make things easier. But I warn you, if you're thinking of cheating me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I swear, in the name of the goddess of the aurora! Please!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Let her go, Rune.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Cautious Clan Villager","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3642c3","IconName":"h3642c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Have you reached an agreement, Clan Mother?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Yes, more or less. I must go now to meet with their allies. You can go back to the village.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Cautious Clan Villager","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3642c3","IconName":"h3642c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is an outrage!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_36_003","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Go! Or would you sabotage our agreement, and have me punish you instead?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Cautious Clan Villager","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3642c3","IconName":"h3642c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Well, when you put it that way... May the aurora light your way.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...I've betrayed the clan and deceived the Grand Sorcerer... It's all my fault, now I'll be punished by the goddess...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(What should I do... I've sullied the tribe...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_38_002","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I thought northerners were all like that Eidatyr, gambling everything away, or dragging everyone around them down in their recklessness.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014But you surprise me, Clan Mother.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I... I'm not as brave as she is. I'm scum. She's the one who ought to be leading our people.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_41_001","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3680","IconName":"h3680s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_41_002","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_41_003","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3680","IconName":"h3680s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...You... Eidatyr...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_41_004","SpeakerName":"Valdrir","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0236","IconName":"h0236s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_408_002_dialog_english##_41_005","SpeakerName":"Theodore","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3681","IconName":"h3681s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Save your reminiscences for another time. We have to be going.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
